EmailTemplate.description: Match Offer Accepted --> Stage = Offer Accepted
EmailTemplate.name: Match Acceptance Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Climate_Corps_Engagement__c.Account__c} has been matched with a fellow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Climate_Corps_Engagement__c.EDF_Engagement_Manager__c},
Good news! A fellow, {!Climate_Corps_Engagement__c.Fellow_Name__c}, has accepted our offer to work with {!Climate_Corps_Engagement__c.Account__c}.
Please begin the match introduction process between the host and fellow. Match introduction emails can be found in the Engagement Management OneNote.
Work Authorization Required?: {!Climate_Corps_Engagement__c.Require_Authorization__c}
